bibl.title: Coptos: Architecture and Assemblages in the Sacred Temenos from Nectanebo to Justinian.
bibl.note: University of Michigan / University of Assiut excavations at Coptos, 1987-1992. - Present an overview of the occupational history together with a brief look at the Hellenistic and Roman pottery assemblages.

bibl.title: Autour de Coptos. Actes du colloque organisé au Musée des Beaux-Arts de Lyon (17-18 mars 2000)

bibl.seg: HERBERT Sharon C. and Andrea M. BERLIN, Coptos: Architecture and Assemblages in the Sacred Temenos from Nectanebo to Justinian.
Autour de Coptos. Actes du colloque organisé au Musée des Beaux-Arts de Lyon (17-18 mars 2000) = Topoi. Orient-Occident. Supplément 3 (Lyon - Paris, 2002) pp. 73-115, 22 figg. et profils.

University of Michigan / University of Assiut excavations at Coptos, 1987-1992. - Present an overview of the occupational history together with a brief look at the Hellenistic and Roman pottery assemblages.
